info.title: spain-weather
info.description: This API provides a comprehensive historical weather data for Spanish cities, provinces, and the country as a whole. The API also includes tools for filtering and searching for specific information, making it easy to find relevant data.

tags.name: location
tags.description: Endpoints related to cities, provinces and Spain.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all locations in Spain.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the location to filter the results by

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Maximum number of items to include in the API response

skip.name: skip
skip.description: How many items should be skipped before starting to include items in the response
